description: Right now the flavors resource dumps the full database models. According to the spec, we only care about a small subset of the values with a slightly different interface.
title: Openstack API /flavors resource does not respect the specification

comments.content: Right now the flavors resource dumps the full database models. According to the spec, we only care about a small subset of the values with a slightly different interface.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
